189674.en:
We are thinking of closing down the Post Office due to the difficult business situation we are facing in
these times. If you need anything, please contact me while you still can.

189675.en:
Although the immortal Demon King has been defeated, the town still bears the scars of war. The Post Office is
also going to close due to financial difficulties. If you need anything, please contact me while you still can.

189676.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Thank you very much! By the way, you
have a visitor. I know this is sudden,
but could you do me a favor?<yesno><break>

189677.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Too bad. We look forward to seeing you
again!

189678.en:
Wow, I'm so happy! I'm asking for a favor regarding the new letterhead we're planning to sell here at the
Post Office. Actually, times are tough, and Marsen there is going to close the Post Office. But I want
everyone to send letters to each other to cheer each other up during this difficult time. I'm thinking of making
letter paper to cheer everyone up, but it's hard to get Stencil Twig, which is the raw material for the paper. I
heard that Stencil Twig is sometimes dropped when you defeat the monster <%sev_que_name0> on Reviewle Highway
South. So, please, can you go and get Stencil Twig? Of course, we'll give you a chance to give out the finished
letter paper!

189679.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Really? I'm so happy! I'm so happy!
Then, I'll be waiting for it with
pleasure!

189680.en:
Really? I did it! What is it? Are you sure you're not taking on too many jobs? That's no good! You're too busy.
I'll be waiting for you, so don't worry! Please come back when you are free!

189681.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Hmmm, too bad. Please come back if you
change your mind!

189682.en:
Thank you very much! And, sir, don't
forget your promise to get the Stencil
Twig.<open_irai><bw_break>

189683.en:
Stencil Twig is sometimes dropped by
defeating <%sev_que_name0> monster on
Reviewle Highway South.

189684.en:
Ah, you have a visitor! Did you bring
what I asked for by any chance?

189685.en:
Well then, I guess I'll have to buy
some letter paper. Let's see...<bw_break>

189686.en:
Thank you very much! Now I can make new stationery! I've already thought of the design. I'll start making the
letter paper right away!

189687.en:
Phew! It's amazing! It's a masterpiece! Here you go, Gran Zedora Castle Limited Edition Local Letter
Cards!

189688.en:
I wonder if any of you travelers have heard about this? The motif is based on Hero Alvan and Ally Kamil, the
princes of this country! If we send letters to each other using this letterhead, I'm sure everyone will be
united by a strong bond just like these two! I'll be sending letters to my loved ones right away!

189689.en:
I wonder if any of you travelers have heard about this? The motif is based on the prince of the land, Hero Alvan
and Ally Kamil! Some people have been criticizing Kamil because his whereabouts are unknown, but I think
there must be a reason for it! If we send letters to each other using this letterhead, I'm sure everyone will be
united by a strong bond like the two of you! I'll start sending letters to my loved ones right away!

189690.en:
Would you like to give Stencil Twig to
Paper Shop Akari?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

189691.en:
<pc> gave Paper Shop Akari a
Stencil Twig!

189707.en:
I just received a letter from Akari. I didn't know she had made such a nice letter. Akari and I have been working
together, but it makes me happy to receive a letter like this again. Reading this letter, my feeble
thoughts of closing the Post Office have been swept away.

189708.en:
Oh, I'm sorry for worrying you. I'm
sorry for worrying you. It's nice to
meet you, Akari.

189709.en:
We, too, will try our best to follow
the example of Hero-sama and deliver
energy to you all. Good bye.<bw_break>

189711.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Wow~ I'm so glad! It's nice to meet
you too~!

190335.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Hey, don't hang around there! The
Demon King's army could attack at any
moment. Get somewhere safe and hide!

190337.en:
We confess all our sins before God. Therefore, whatever we hear in the Church, we, the servants of God, will
never speak of it. However... You don't think that Ally Kamil and Yaslam are... No, no, no, no! I didn't hear
anything!

190339.en:
Wait a minute! The ground is loose on this road, the cliff might collapse! If you want to go to the castle, go
towards the plaza!

190341.en:
I write a letter every day to my
father who is guarding the Three Way
Gate. He only replies sometimes.

190343.en:
Well, you are a traveler, aren't you? I know it's not safe here in Gran Zedora either, but let's pray together
for peace. Well...

190345.en:
I want to run away to the castle, but my legs are shaking and I can't walk. Young man. You should at least run to
the castle!

190347.en:
Hiccup that the Demon King's army is attacking! I'm off duty, so I drank a lot! It's all because of that amazing
fake sake. It's a 100 year old secret. The more you soak it, the better it gets, so I drank too much. Hiccup. I
wonder how good the ultimate 1,000-year-old pickles are. No, no! I'm more interested in the Demon
King's army!
190347.ja:

190348.en:
You, don't just stand around here like a fool, get to the castle and evacuate! You never know when the
Demon King's army will attack!

190349.en:
Gran Zedora is Hero's hometown. And since ally also appeared, I thought that only this country was safe. But
the Demon King was a more powerful being than Hero and ally. The proof is in the state of Castle Town.
190349.ja:

190350.en:
Papa went to fight the evil Demon King to protect Hero! But he hasn't come back for a long time. Mom works at the
castle, so she only comes home on her days off. Isn't it great to be home all by yourself?

190351.en:
I can't believe that Hero Alvan and ally took advantage of the time when the castle was empty and attacked us!
At this rate, Gran Zedora will be finished!

190352.en:
When it's life or death every day against the Demon King's army, everyone needs a distraction. This is
when we come in! We'll show you a dance so hot that you can forget everything for a moment and have fun!
Of course, we'll charge a reasonable fee.

190353.en:
I don't recognize your face, but you must be a traveler. We have been informed that the Demon King's army
will soon attack Castle Town. Hurry and evacuate to the castle!

190354.en:
Cackle, cackle! I've been working for the humans in this tavern, but I think it's time to switch to the Demon King.
I think it's time to switch sides with the Demon King. This country's going to ruin. Cackle!
190354.ja:
ã€Œã‚­ãƒ£ã‚­ãƒ£ã‚­ãƒ£ï¼ ã€€ã“ã‚Œã¾ã§ã€€ãƒ‹ãƒ³ã‚²ãƒ³ãŸã¡ã«ã€€å‘³æ–¹ã—ã¦ ã€€ã“ã®ã€€é…’å ´ã‚’ã€€ã‚„ã£ã¦ããŸã‘ã©ã‚ˆãƒ¼ã€‚

190355.en:
You! Don't just stand around here,
quickly take refuge in the castle! I'm
sure they'll let travelers in!

190356.en:
There is a large castle gate leading
out of the town. However, the castle
gate has been stubbornly closed.

190357.en:
Wait a minute! The ground is loose on this road, the cliff might collapse! If you want to go to the castle, go
towards the plaza!

190358.en:
Across this Bridge of Heroes is the great Gran Zedora Castle! Oh, you are the Hero Alvan from earlier. Hero
Alvan is waiting for you at the castle. You'd better get on your way.
190358.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®ã€€å‹‡è€…ã®æ©‹ã‚’ã€€æ¸¡ã£ãŸã¨ã“ã‚ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã®ãŒ ã€€å‰å¤§ãªã‚‹ã€€ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ³ã‚¼ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ãƒ©åŸã ï¼

190359.en:
A port? There are no such things in
this country. There's nowhere to run.
We are going to die here.

190361.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>The flower beds in this plaza. I've
been taking good care of them every
day. And now, you monsters.

190362.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I knew that Hero Alvan and Ally Kamil
would be there when Gran Zedora was in
trouble!<bw_break>

190363.en:
Hmm? Yeah. You worked hard too! Good
night, traveler.

190364.en:
Oh! You are the traveler who defeated Giga Clubber earlier. You are the traveler who defeated Giga Clubber
earlier. You heard Hero Alvan. He will introduce you to His Majesty the King. You may proceed to the throne room of
the castle.
190364.ja:
ã€ŒãŠãŠï¼ã€€ãŠå‰ã¯ã€€ã•ãã»ã© ã€€ã‚®ãƒ¼ã‚°ãƒãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’å€’ã—ã¦ãã‚ŒãŸã€€æ—…ã®è€…ã ãªã€‚ ã€€ãªã‹ãªã‹ã€€è¦‹äº‹ãªã€€ã‚¦ãƒ‡å‰ã ã£ãŸãã€‚

190365.en:
Alvan and Kamil have gone to the Demon King's castle to scout around. If you want to talk to them, why don't you go
to the castle?

190367.en:
Across the Bridge of Heroes is the great Gran Zedora Castle! Hmm? Have you seen Kamil? It seems that Kamil
has just left Castle Town and is on his way out of town. He looked even more handsome than before!
190367.ja:
ã€Œã“ã®ã€€å‹‡è€…ã®æ©‹ã‚’ã€€æ¸¡ã£ãŸã¨ã“ã‚ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã®ãŒ ã€€å‰å¤§ãªã‚‹ã€€ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ³ã‚¼ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ãƒ©åŸã ï¼ ã€€â€¦â€¦ã‚€ã£ï¼Ÿã€€ã‚«ãƒŸãƒ«ã•ã¾ã‚’ã€€è¦‹ãªã‹ã£ãŸã‹ã ã¨ï¼Ÿ

190368.en:
Just now, Kamil said he was going out of town by order of the king, so I opened the castle gate. What's going
on? Did he go alone to search for the forbidden secret that seals the power of immortality? As expected of ally
Kamil. If you wish to assist in the search for the mystic arts, feel free to pass through the castle gate.
Please help Kamil as much as you have to help us!

190369.en:
Ally Kamil has gone out of town to search for the forbidden secret that seals the power of immortality. If you
wish to help, you are free to pass through the castle gate. Help Kamil for our sake!

190370.en:
She is a beautiful lady, but she always has such a pensive expression on her face that it makes me feel a
little sorry for her. It seems that she sometimes meets with Yaslam, the caretaker of Princess Vistaria, so it
would be nice if she could be pampered in front of him.
190370.ja:
ã€Œã‚«ãƒŸãƒ«ã•ã¾ã¯ã€€ãŠãã‚Œã„ãªæ–¹ãªã®ã« ã€€ã„ã¤ã‚‚ã€€æ€ã„ã¤ã‚ãŸè¡¨æƒ…ã°ã‹ã‚Šã§ ã€€è¦‹ã¦ã„ã¦ã€€ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨ã€€ã‹ã‚ã„ãã†ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã‚ˆã€‚

190371.en:
Across the Bridge of Heroes is the great Gran Zedora Castle! Oh, there you are! I take good care of you,
Kamil!

190372.en:
You! Could that be the smell of a
thousand-year-old cock? Answer me
honestly! I know you have it!<yesno><break>

190373.en:
Mm? No? That's strange. It smelled
like a slightly peculiar and tasty
pickles.

190374.en:
Oh! It really exists in this world. A thousand-year-old Millennium Pickling! Thank you, God. Thank you for this
encounter! To tell you the truth, I'd like a slice, but you'll have to get your hands on one yourself. Someday,
I'm going to eat one too!

190375.en:
What's up? Did you manage to meet Ally Kamil? Kamil has not returned to Castle Town. Why don't you look for
him outside of town?

ã€Œã©ã†ã—ãŸï¼Ÿã€€ç›Ÿå‹ã‚«ãƒŸãƒ«ã©ã®ã¨ã¯ ã€€ç„¡äº‹ã«ã€€ä¼šãˆãŸã®ã‹ï¼Ÿ

190376.en:
After all, pickles are the best snacks for sake! Some people say ''karaage'' or ''salt'', but well-pickled tsukemono is
the best!

190377.en:
Across the Bridge of Heroes is the great Gran Zedora Castle! You have finally returned. Alvan and Kamil have
already returned to the castle. They must have found some secret magic.

190378.en:
A few days ago, Ally Kamil stopped by the Church and said ''Say a Prayer'' to God with a very sad face. I tried to
talk to her, but she left immediately.

190379.en:
Whew! Hiccup. Ally Kamil received something about Kinki-no-something? Kinki-kinky? Well, no way! You mean
you received kinki no nikki-stewed? Although it's not as good as tsukemono, kinki no nikki-nimono is
perfectly good as a snack with sake! Ally Kamil! Ally Kamil! He seems to be quite a good looking mouth. Damn, I
want my share!

190380.en:
I had heard that Alvan-sama was injured, but he seems to be doing very well. Ally Kamil is back safe and
sound, and now it's time for the two of you to go and punish the Demon King!

190382.en:
A little while ago, Lady Alvan returned with her daughter-in-law, Lady Vistaria. The princess was
injured. What happened? Yes, yes. After that, Kamil came back alone. It seems everyone is headed for the
castle.
190382.ja:

190384.en:
Alvan and his bride, the princess, are very far apart in age, and they are like brother and sister. On the other
hand, Kamil and Yaslam's ages are also perfect when they are side by side! You think so too, don't you?
190384.ja:
ã€Œã‚¢ãƒ«ãƒ´ã‚¡ãƒ³ã•ã¾ã¨ã€€è¨±å«ã®ãŠå§«ã•ã¾ã¯ ã€€å¹´ã‚‚ã€€ãšã„ã¶ã‚“ã€€é›¢ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã— ã€€ãªã‚“ã ã‹ã€€å…„ã¨å¦¹ã¿ãŸã„ãªã€€çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã­ã€‚

190385.en:
Across the Bridge of Heroes is the great Gran Zedora Castle! Hmm? Why are you here? There must be a grand feast
in the throne room celebrating the departure of Hero and Ally. Go and show your face to them.

190386.en:
Ally Kamil found the trump card to defeat the immortal Demon King! Then we can beat the Demon King's army this
time! When the world is at peace, I'm sure this town will be back to its former glory. Travelers from all over
the world will come to Gran Zedora!

190387.en:
Listen, listen! I got a letter from your father guarding the Three Way Gate! He says thank you for your daily
messages. His handwriting is a little less sharp than before, but I'm just happy to know he's doing well!
Ahehehe!
190387.ja:
ã€Œèã„ã¦èã„ã¦ï¼ã€€ä¸‰é–€ã®é–¢æ‰€ã‚’ ã€€å®ˆã£ã¦ã‚‹ã€€ãŠçˆ¶ã•ã‚“ã‹ã‚‰ã€€æ‰‹ç´™ãŒæ¥ãŸã®ï¼ ã€€æ¯æ—¥ã€€ãŠãŸã‚ˆã‚Šã€€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ã†â€¦â€¦ã ã£ã¦ã€‚

190388.en:
When the Demon King is vanquished by Hero-sama and the world is at peace, I will plant flowers in this flowerbed
again. I hope that everyone will be able to relax and enjoy the beauty of the flowers.

190389.en:
I see! At last, Hero Alvan and Ally Kamil will defeat the immortal Demon King. Once the Demon King is gone,
Castle Town will return to its former beauty. Alvan-sama! Hang in there!

190390.en:
I hear that Ally Kamil has discovered the secret to defeating the immortal Demon King! Ally is an indispensable
part of Hero, after all! These days of hardship will soon be over. Thinking of that gives me the strength to live.
I have nothing but gratitude for Ally Kamil.

190391.en:
Mom brought us a feast a while ago. She said it's Pachy at the castle! I love perchy. I want to wear a sparkly
dress and dance around in it!
190391.ja:
ã€ŒãƒãƒãŒã­ã€€ã•ã£ãã€€ã”ã¡ãã†ã‚’ ã€€æŒã£ã¦ãã¦ãã‚ŒãŸã®ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ãŠåŸã§ã€€ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒã‚£ãƒ¼ãªã‚“ã ã£ã¦ï¼

190392.en:
I heard that Ally Kamil found a super secret weapon! I knew I could count on you! When Hero and Ally defeat Demon
King, I bet the whole country will celebrate! I'll be dancing like a fiend too!

190393.en:
At last, a decisive battle against the immortal Demon King! As long as they have the secret magic to block the
power of immortality, Hero and Ally are bound to win! Oh no! This is a great celebration. I hear there's a
grand feast going on at the castle. Why don't you join us?

190394.en:
Cackle, cackle! I'm always on the side of the humans. But I can't compare to Hero and ally! Demon King messed up
too. ally or Hero, whichever one of them should've been taken out first!
190394.ja:
ã€Œã‚­ãƒ£ã‚­ãƒ£ã‚­ãƒ£ï¼ã€€ãŠã‚Œã•ã¾ã¯ ã€€ã„ã¤ã ã£ã¦ã€€ãƒ‹ãƒ³ã‚²ãƒ³ã®å‘³æ–¹ã•ããƒ¼ã€‚ ã€€ã ã£ã¦ã€€å‹‡è€…ã¨ç›Ÿå‹ã«ã¯ã€€ã‹ãªã‚ã­ãˆï¼

190395.en:
It is true that at first light, Lady Alvan flew alone from the Bridge of Heroes to the Demon King's castle on
her Pegasus. But that doesn't mean I still can't believe it. Come to think of it, some strange people passed by a
while ago. A strange man accompanied by a black cat was heading for Castle Town.

190396.en:
I have seen for sure. I saw Kamil and Yaslam in secret meeting in this Church. At that time, they were
discussing the possibility of abandoning Gran Zedora and fleeing to some distant land. There is no doubt
about it!
190396.ja:

190397.en:
The Immortal Demon King is so strong that even ally can escape from him. Hero Alvan will be killed by the Demon
King and Gran Zedora will be destroyed. Hero Alvan will be killed by the Demon King and Gran Zedora will
be destroyed this time. It's the end of the world.

190398.en:
Let us pray to God for Ally Kamil and
Hero Alvan's safety and peace. And
now...<bw_break>

190399.en:
When the Demon King is defeated by Hero-sama and the world is at peace, I will plant flowers in this flowerbed
again. That's what I was thinking. Why did Ally Kamil run away?

190400.en:
Hiccup. I think I drank a little too
much. Weeek!

190401.en:
I remember it well. I remember how Hero and Ally defeated the hordes of monsters that attacked Castle Town.
That's why I still can't believe it when I heard that Ally Kamil has escaped. There must be some kind of
mistake.
190401.ja:
ã€Œä¿ºã¯ã€€ã‚ˆãƒ¼ãã€€è¦šãˆã¦ã„ã‚‹ãœã€‚ ã€€åŸä¸‹ç”ºã¸è¥²ã£ã¦ããŸã€€é­”ç‰©ã®ç¾¤ã‚Œã‚’ ã€€å‹‡è€…ã¨ã€€ç›Ÿå‹ãŒã€€å€’ã—ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã¨ã“ã‚ã‚’â€¦â€¦ã€‚

190402.en:
It was a strange sight. A man in a ridiculous outfit was chasing behind the black cat. What? Where did they
go? Well, it looked like they went out of town through Castle Town.

190403.en:
Mom said... I saw you fall when you frightened the king at Perchy's castle! I'm so big now, I wouldn't
fall off even if I frightened you! You know, you're better than the king!

190404.en:
Rumor has it that Ally Kamil betrayed Alvan and ran away on his own, and now Castle Town is in an uproar! Since
Alvan isn't here, there's no way to know if it's true or not. What the hell is going on?

190405.en:
I'm just a girl, even if I'm called ''ally'' or something. I'll spare my own life. And if a handsome, gentlemanly
guy hit on me, of course I'd go with him. It can't be helped!
190405.ja:

190406.en:
A while ago, a strange man, not seen around here before, left town after chasing a black cat. I think he was
probably headed toward the watchtower, but what in the world was he doing there? What the hell was he doing
there? Where is the watchtower? It's just outside Castle Town, on the Gran Zedora Territory, south by the sea!

190407.en:
Some time ago, I saw a black cat and a strange man leaving Castle Town and heading towards the watchtower. The
watchtower is located by the sea, south of Gran Zedora Territory!

190408.en:
Cackle!ally got away! The Demon King must have been so scared, he tucked his tail between his legs! I knew I
shouldn't be a human after all. I'll send a hearty kiss to the Demon King. Cackle!

190409.en:
Mr. Kamil was meeting with Mr. Yaslam frequently to discuss abandoning Gran Zedora. They're both strangers. It
must have been a shame to throw away their lives for Gran Zedora.

190410.en:
At first light, Alvan flew alone from this Bridge of Heroes to the Demon King's castle on his Pegasus. Ah. If I
could fly, I would go to help Alvan- sama!

190411.en:
I wonder if Alvan-sama, who went alone
to the Demon King's castle, is safe. I
hope he has someone to help him.

190412.en:
Across the Bridge of Heroes is the
castle of Gran Zedora. They're all in
mourning for the prince.

190413.en:
I still don't feel at ease in the country, but I heard that a port will be built here soon. A leisurely boat
trip sounds nice!

190414.en:
My father used to guard the Three Way Gate. But he was killed by a monster a long time ago. I wrote to him every
day.Sometimes the reply I got was written by someone else. In place of your dead father. I was happy when I
got the letter, but I wish I had known the truth earlier.
190414.ja:

190415.en:
For now, let's just say a prayer of
thanksgiving to God for the return of
peace to the world. Now...<bw_break>

190416.en:
Hero has defeated the immortal Demon King in exchange for his pure soul and has brought peace to the world once
again. Plant many flowers here as a tribute to Alvan. May they never forget him.

190417.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Because the world has become peaceful!
Off-duty days It has increased! Weeek.
Sake is so good!

190418.en:
Mom is coming home early every day because she is at peace! But, you know, Daddy has gone far away and
won't be coming back.
190418.ja:
ã€ŒãƒãƒãŒã­ãƒ¼ã€€å¹³å’Œã«ãªã£ãŸã‹ã‚‰ ã€€æ¯æ—¥ã€€ã¯ã‚„ãƒ¼ãã€€ãŠã†ã¡ã« ã€€å¸°ã£ã¦ãã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã®ï¼

190419.en:
Alvan has defeated the immortal Demon King and restored peace to the world. But what about that ally? I don't know
what he's doing, but I hope Kamil never sets foot in Gran Zedora again!
190419.ja:
ã€Œã‚¢ãƒ«ãƒ´ã‚¡ãƒ³ã•ã¾ã¯ã€€ä¸æ­»ã®é­”ç‹ã‚’å€’ã— ã€€ä¸–ç•Œã«ã€€å¹³å’Œã‚’ã€€å–ã‚Šæˆ»ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã£ãŸã€‚ ã€€â€¦â€¦ã ãŒã€€ã‚ã®ç›Ÿå‹ã¨ã‚„ã‚‰ã¯ã€€ã©ã†ã ï¼ï¼Ÿ

190420.en:
There was an announcement from the castle. Pegasus told us that Alvan had been a stranger. And this! It's
because Kamil ran away! I will never forgive that woman!
190420.ja:
ã€Œâ€¦â€¦åŸã‹ã‚‰ã€€ãŠãµã‚ŒãŒã‚ã£ãŸã€‚ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ«ãƒ´ã‚¡ãƒ³ã•ã¾ã¯ã€€é‚„ã‚‰ã¬äººã¨ãªã£ãŸã¨ ã€€ãƒšã‚¬ã‚µã‚¹ãŒã€€ä¼ãˆã¦ãã‚ŒãŸãã†ã ã€‚

190421.en:
Cak-cak-cak! Hero is awesome! I love
human! Cak-cak-cak!

193941.en:
I've been training to be a doctor by assisting Dr. Lorenzo, the resident doctor at the castle, but I've been
really busy and exhausted every day. I'm not used to having to behave so well at all times in the castle, and I
need a break every once in a while to catch my breath.

193946.en:
Would you like to ask Yanan what he
was talking about with Princess
Felina?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

193947.en:
<pc> casually asked Yanan
what he and Princess Felina had talked
about recently!

193948.en:
Yanan told me about Princess Felina.
Let's go and listen to what other men
have to say!<se_nots System 7>

193949.en:
Yanan told me about Princess Felina! Now that we've heard from all the men on the short list, let's go to Arken's
and report back!

193951.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>I've been summoned to Princess
Felina's room to talk to her.

193952.en:
Did you hear me talking to myself, by any chance? Oh, no! I did talk to the Princess recently! The other day, she
called me into her room and asked me a lot of questions about Kamil-sama's injury. It just so happened that Dr.
Lorenzo was busy that day, so I was assigned to treat Kamil's injuries after he returned from the battle. I
think the princess wanted to talk to me, so she called Kamil-sama as an excuse. I think I'm finally becoming
popular too!

193953.en:
The other day, the Princess suddenly called me into her room and asked me enthusiastically about Kamil-sama's
injury. It just so happened that Dr. Lorenzo was busy that day, so I was assigned to treat Master Kamil's
injuries after he returned from the battle. I think the princess wanted to talk to me, so she called Kamil-sama
as an excuse. I think I'm finally becoming popular too!

194384.en:
Ah! You're a traveler in that unfamiliar outfit, aren't you? I'm a little concerned about something. My
big brother Gavel, who went out of town, hasn't come back. He's a very strong soldier, so I'm sure he'd beat
the monsters to a pulp, but as expected, he's late. You're not as strong as him, but you seem strong
too.
194384.ja:

194385.en:
Kohoho, kohoho. I'm sorry I'm dressed like this. I was told by my family doctor to rest. But I can't see my
older son. Where did he go? Could it be because I said that I couldn't forget the taste of Granberry that I
had with my husband who was killed in the war?

194386.en:
He went to pick Granberry, a favorite
food of Mom's ailing mother.<open_irai><bw_break>

194387.en:
Ahh! You! You went to check on my
brother, didn't you?

194388.en:
Oh, that's not right. I'm sorry for
making you wait so long.

194389.en:
What? These are the granberries you
went to pick for Mom, right? How did
you get them?

194390.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr><icon_exc>Maybe something happened to my
brother! Tell me what YOU have seen!

194391.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>What? You're kidding.You're going on a
mission without telling I or Mom?<bw_break>

194392.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>No way. That strong brother of mine
won't let a monster beat him.<bw_break>

194393.en:
That's right! This is a thank you from me. I really appreciate you checking up on my brother and bringing him that
last Granberry. Please take it without Enrio!

194394.en:
I really appreciate you. But right now, I'd like to be alone for a little while. I'm sorry, but I'd like you to
leave.

194395.en:
Do you want to give Milo the Granberry
entrusted to you by Gavel?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

194397.en:
Do I tell them that I can't come home on short notice as per Gavel's last will and testament? Or do you tell the
truth? tell the truth according to the will true Tell the truth

194398.en:
Milo nudged <pc> to leave the
house.

194400.en:
When <pc> went outside, she
heard screaming from inside the house,
as if squeezing out grief.

194402.en:
The heartbreaking screams echoed for
some time afterward.

194403.en:
Oh, it's you! Thanks for coming by. I'm fine. She's doing great. I'll protect her from now on! And I'm gonna
make sure she eats lots of granberries. Just like my sweet, tough brother tried to do for me. Don't
worry! I have the same blood as my brave brother. I will not be defeated by monsters and the harsh world!

194404.en:
Hohoho, hoho. My older son had gone to pick my favorite Granberry, and I was able to eat it for the first time in a
while. Since the Demon King's army invaded, I didn't think I would ever eat them again, so they were so
delicious that I cried. It was more delicious than any granberry I had ever eaten. I have to thank my son for
being so kind to me. I heard that he won't be back for a while. I can't help but hope that Milo will be happy.

194424.en:
Good! Thanks a lot! You went to pick Granberry, Mom's favorite food. He wanted to make sure Mom had some, so
he sneaked out, but with the Demon King's army around here, it's dangerous everywhere. Maybe something
happened along the way. You're supposed to be heading to Garial Cave, south of Gran Zedora Territory. If
he's in trouble, help him out, will you? I can't leave my mother's side. I'm sorry, but please, I'm begging
you!

194425.en:
I'm glad! I thought so, but you seem to be full of other requests. I'd appreciate it if you could do me a
favor when you're done with your business.
194425.ja:

194426.en:
Well, that's too bad. If you change
your mind, talk to me again.

194427.en:
This whole area is in danger because of the Demon King's army. Maybe something happened along the way. My
brother is supposed to be heading to Garial Cave, south of Gran Zedora Territory. If he's in trouble, help
him out, will you?

194428.en:
<close_irai>I can't leave my mother's side. I'm
sorry, but please, I'm begging you!

194652.en:
Okay. Okay! I'll have to protect Mom until my brother comes back. You're not what you seem, but you have a kind
heart.

194654.en:
Okay, I get it. Thanks for telling me something that's hard to say. Ever since the war with the Demon King's
army started, I had a feeling that one day this would happen. So don't worry! From now on, I'll protect Mom instead
of you!

ã€Œã ã‹ã‚‰ã€€å¤§ä¸ˆå¤«ï¼ ã€€ã“ã‚Œã‹ã‚‰ã¯ã€€å…„ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã«ä»£ã‚ã£ã¦ ã€€ã‚ªã‚¤ãƒ©ãŒã€€æ¯ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã®ã“ã¨ã€€å®ˆã‚‹ã‚ˆï¼

194658.en: Brother! Damn it! Why, why! Ughhhh.

194674.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Ugh, if the guests hadn't come, I
would have wanted to evacuate to the
safety of the castle. Well...<bw_break>

194675.en:
The Demon King's army is outside! However, if you don't do your job properly, your boss, who is scarier
than a monster, will get angry with you. Now, let's see...

194676.en:
The Demon King's army is coming! Well, then, customers. Then you'd better go to my store and make sure everything
is ready. Well...

194677.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no. If I wasn't a store keeper,
I'd run to the castle first. Oh, ho,
ho, ho. Well then...<bw_break>

194678.en:
Our monsters are all very skilled!
Even the Demon King's army won't beat
us! Well...<bw_break>

194679.en:
The Demon King's army has arrived, and
all the daredevil adventurers are
here. Please hire them. Well...<bw_break>

194680.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I smell delicious fish when the Demon
King's army comes! Do something about
it first! Well...<bw_break>

194681.en:
What's going on? The Demon King's army is coming! But this is the time to equip yourself at the bazaar and
survive! Well...

194682.en:
What a surprise. I didn't know that the Demon King's army would be attacking us soon. Then think
carefully and change your job. Well...

194683.en:
Ally Kamil is staying at our inn! I'm
sure the monsters won't attack us for
fear of Mr. Kamil. Well...<bw_break>

194684.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>I can't move from here because I have
to protect my treasured trinkets! But
you must take refuge in the castle!

194685.en:
Monster didn't attack our inn either. It must be because they are afraid of Ally Kamil who is staying at this inn!
Well then...

194686.en:
Traveler. Terrible, isn't it? Look at the state of things. This used to be a beautiful Castle Town until the Demon
King's army attacked a while ago.

194687.en:
Tsukemono is a specialty around here. The longer you soak the tsukemono, the tastier the tsukemono becomes. There
are people in the Rovos Highlands who bury the pots of tsukemono in the ground every year and let them mature.
Not only for one year and five years, but for a hundred or even a thousand years! It is said that the taste is
beyond human knowledge.

194688.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>Ally Kamil? Yeah, he left. He
overcharged me for lodging! What an
ally! What's ally? Well...<bw_break>

194703.en:
Kamil must have run away because he
was afraid to fight the immortal Demon
King! That's what I would do.

194810.en:
Lately, my daughter has been coming
home late.I'm worried because nothing
like this has ever happened before.

194811.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>But you are late. It's about time for
them to be home by now.

194812.en:
<icon_exc><turn_pc>Well. You look like you're getting
good at this. Just as well! Will you
do me a favor?<bw_break>

194813.en:
Oh, you can do it! Now, go visit Soldier Lylock at the Three Way Gate on Reviewle Highway South. Maybe he's
still doing some sort of Michikuzu at his place. I'm looking forward to working with you.
194813.ja:
ã€ŒãŠãŠã€€ã‚„ã£ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã‹ï¼ ã€€ã§ã¯ã€€ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ«è¡—é“å—ã®ä¸‰é–€ã®é–¢æ‰€ã«ã„ã‚‹ ã€€å…µå£«ã®ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ã€€è¨ªã­ã‚‹ã®ã˜ã‚ƒã€‚

194814.en:
Oh, will you do it?But you have many
requests. Please finish them and then
come back.

194815.en:
Okay, I'm sorry. If you change your
mind, come back.

194816.en:
Would you like to give Dr. Yog a copy
of Celedine's Letter?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

194817.en:
<pc> gave Celedine's Letter
to Dr. Yog.

194818.en:
Oh, thank you for coming home. How was
my daughter?

194819.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>I see. He hasn't been found yet. Where
is she selling oil?

194820.en:
This is certainly Celedine's handwriting.At any rate, it means that my daughter is safe. That's good. I'll
be back after I finish treating my friend's injury, so don't worry so much. I'll be fine. I'll have my
friend give me a lift back to the town.He's so smart and cool! I'll introduce you to him next time, okay?
I'm sorry to worry you. But I'm glad to hear you're all right. Thank you for all the trouble you've put me
through. This is my way of saying thank you.
194820.ja:
ã€Œã“ã‚Œã¯ã€€ç¢ºã‹ã«ã€€ã‚»ãƒ¬ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒã®å­—ã˜ã‚ƒãªã€‚ ã€€ã¨ã‚Šã‚ãˆãšã€€å¨˜ã¯ç„¡äº‹ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã‹ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ˆã‹ã£ãŸâ€¦â€¦ã€‚

194821.en:
The truth is, when Celedine found someone suitable, I was going to give her the house and retire to my home
village. My back has been getting worse lately, and I thought it would be a good time to retire to that
village where the River of Light heals. However, she was so absorbed in her medical studies, saying she wanted
to become a doctor like her father, that she never wanted to have a boyfriend. But now the day is finally
coming when a weight will finally be lifted from my shoulders. I'm really looking forward to seeing what kind of
man will appear in front of me.

194822.en:
I was thinking of leaving this place and retiring to my home village, where the River of Light is located, when my
daughter finds someone good enough for her. But was there anyone around the barrier who could be my daughter's
boyfriend? Lylock? He's out of the question.

194854.en:
I asked my daughter Celedine to run an errand to Three Way Gate to deliver some medicine, but she came home late.
She's been a bit of a pussy lately, and I'm worried about her. So, I was wondering if you would do me a favor
and go check on her?
194854.ja:
ã€Œã˜ã¤ã¯ãªã€€å¨˜ã®ã‚»ãƒ¬ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒã« ã€€ä¸‰é–€ã®é–¢æ‰€ã¸ã€€è–¬ã‚’å±Šã‘ã‚‹ãŠä½¿ã„ã‚’ ã€€é ¼ã‚“ã ã®ã˜ã‚ƒãŒã€€å¸°ã‚ŠãŒé…ãã¦ã®ã†ã€‚

194855.en:
I want you to go check on my daughter
Celedine who has gone to Three Way
Gate to deliver medicine.<open_irai><bw_break>

194856.en:
When you get to the Three Way Gate, ask the soldier Lylock about his daughter. He may still be somewhere
around there.

194857.en:
<attr><close_irai><end_attr>To get to the Three Way Gate, follow
Reviewle Highway South. I'll be
looking forward to working with you.

194903.en:
Oh yes, I forgot to mention something important. Kyuru, if you go back in the Ethenel Cube from this time
period, you will arrive at Gran Zedora Castle in the present day. For each time period you leap forward in time,
you will return to a place closely related to . Then, this time, I'll leave the rest to you!

195376.en:
I'm worried. I'm worried about my
brother Gavel, who went out of town.
It's a little late, and I'm worried.

230930.en:
I used to be a castle gardener. I left him in the hands of a skilled apprentice, but he got caught up in a
battle with the Demon King's army. I can't take care of the castle garden by myself, but I'd like to at least
clean up the flowers in the plaza.

230932.en:
I am Girion, the former gardener. What
do you want?

230934.en:
Okay. A memento of my father's life in the pond. Trod's father died defending the king against the Demon King's
army. Lord Alvan and Kamil were away at the time, and the castle was poorly defended.

230936.en:
Oops, the name Kamil is not openly spoken in Gran Zedora today. Oh yes, if you want to know how to drain a
pond, leave it to me! You can use this Thirstone, a gardener's necessity. Thirstone is what can dry up any great
river? Do you know? Then we'll have a quick talk. You'll just have to wait and see.
230936.ja:

ã€Œã‹ã‚ãã®çŸ³ã¨ã¯ã€€ã©ã‚“ãªå¤§æ²³ã‚’ã‚‚ ã€€å¹²ä¸ŠãŒã‚‰ã›ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒâ€¦â€¦ãªã«ï¼Ÿã€€çŸ¥ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ï¼Ÿ ã€€ãªã‚‰ã°ã€€è©±ãŒæ—©ã„ã€‚å°‘ã—ã€€å¾…ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã¨ã„ã„ã€‚

230938.en:
Hmmm. We're in trouble. Thirstone was of no use in the castle pond. At first it looked as if the water had receded,
but then some strange magic circle flashed, and the water came rushing in, one after the other. Perhaps
someone had performed some unholy trick on the pond. No mere gardener could have done it. But the great
Sage, Captain Stolke, may be able to break the evil spell. Captain Stolke should be in the watchtower of Gran
Zedora Territory. Please consult him about the pond at the castle!

230940.en:
informed Girion that Trod, a soldier at the castle, had dropped something in the pond and
wanted to drain it!

230942.en:
Old Man Girion took Thirstone with him to the castle pond. But Old Man Girion returned soon after with a sullen look
on his face.

230944.en:
Even Thirstone's power could not dry up the water in the castle pond. Perhaps it is because of the strange
magic that has been cast on him. But perhaps Grand Sage Captain Stolke can break the evil spell. Captain Stolke
should be in the watchtower of Gran Zedora Territory. Talk to him about the pond at the castle! I'm counting
on you.
230944.ja:

230946.en:
Oh! Captain Stolke has taught you how to break the evil arts. This should help Thirstone. All right, let's make
this quick! Let's go see Trod at the castle!

230948.en:
I never expected to find a dead body in the castle pond. I've seen him dressed like that before, but who the
hell was he? I heard that Trod asked you to do something for him. I don't care about me, just save him.

ã€Œã¾ã•ã‹ã€€åŸã®æ± ã‹ã‚‰ã€€æ­»ä½“ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã‚‹ã¨ã¯â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã©ã“ã‹ã§ã€€è¦‹ãŸã‚ˆã†ãªæœè£…ã‚’ã—ã¦ã„ãŸãŒ ã€€ã‚ã‚Œã¯ã€€ã„ã£ãŸã„ã€€èª°ãªã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒï¼Ÿ

230952.en:
After that, I went back to the bottom of the pond and found Trod's father's medal. I'm going to give it to him
after I get the dirt off of it.

230954.en:
Across this Bridge of Heroes is the
great Gran Zedora Castle, defended by
Hero Alvan and Ally Kamil!

230956.en:
I am a servant of God, and yet I am so deceived by the monster's schemes that I doubt the ally I should believe in.
I am ashamed of myself. Oh, God. Have mercy on this foolish lamb.

230958.en:
If my apprentice gardener had lived, the real Lord Yaslam's body would have been found much sooner. Then both
Alvan and Kamil might not have been killed. I have made up my mind! I'm going back to being the castle
gardener! I'm going to give the flowerbeds and the pond a thorough tidy up so that nothing like this will
ever happen again!

230960.en:
I heard the King's announcement, but I'm still skeptical. But, you know, hearing the announcement reminded me
of the time when Alvan and Kamil went out together to defeat the Giga Clubber who had attacked Castle Town.
I remember how reliable Alvan and Kamil were when they defeated the Giga Clubber who attacked Castle Town with
just the two of them.

230962.en:
I have heard your message. How foolish I was to be deceived by the monster disguised as Lord Yaslam and to doubt
Ally Kamil. The people of this land, whose hearts have been sobered by the Demon King's endless warfare, have
lost the one thing they most needed to believe in.
